location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Index Map to the Military Reports and Route Maps of Persia.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 150 x 185 mm, on sheet 180 x 220 mm.Materials: Printed in colour on paper.

mods.abstract: Map of Persia, with coastlines, rivers and boundaries marked. Annotations and boundaries printed in black indicate the areas covered by each volume of the Military Report (volumes I-IV). Lines and annotations in red indicate geographic regions (for example, Kerman, Seistan [Sīstān]). The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office and includes a printing statement which reads ‘'S.D.O. Topo. No. 6197, Sept. 1930.’

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
